reg_info.act_under: Registry Act   Loi sur l’enregistrement des actes

content.content:
1. The fees set out in the Schedule are payable under the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 994, s. 1. SCHEDULE   TARIFF OF FEES  Item

Column 1

Column 2


 

Service

Fee


1.

 

Except as set out in items 2 and 3, for registration or deposit of an instrument or plan, including recording

$50.00


2.

 

For registration of,

 


 

 

(a) a certificate under subsection 3 (3) of the Housing Development Act;

 


 

 

(b) a notice of credit or refund or a certificate of discharge under subsection 2 (5) of The Municipal and School Tax Credit Assistance Act, being chapter 285 of the Revised Statutes of Ontario, 1970;

 


 

 

(c) a lien clearance certificate or affidavit of exemption under The Land Speculation Tax Act, 1974, being chapter 17;

 


 

 

(d) a copy of the plan and field notes of a municipal or crown resurvey under Part VIII of the Surveys Act;

 


 

 

(e) a notice of a change of address for service; or

 


 

 

(f) a plan under the Boundaries Act 

No fee


 

 

(g) Revoked: O. Reg. 516/93, s. 1 (2).

 


 

 

(h) Revoked: O. Reg. 516/93, s. 1 (2).

 


3.

 

For registration of,

 


 

 

(a) a declaration and description under the Condominium Act,

 


 

 

(i) basic fee 

50.00


 

 

(ii) for each unit created by the description 

5.00


 

 

(b) a plan of subdivision,

 


 

 

(i) basic fee 

50.00


 

 

(ii) for each lot or block created by the plan 

2.00


4.

 

For a search of,

 


 

 

(a) a fee, receiving or day book 

No fee


 

 

(b) any other index or register for a parcel 

5.00


 

 

(c) an instrument, deposit or plan 

No fee


5.

(1)

For a copy of,

 


 

 

(a) an instrument or plan, for each page 

.50


 

 

(b) the index or register for a parcel,

 


 

 

(i) for the first page 

5.00


 

 

(ii) for each subsequent page 

1.00


 

(2)

For a paper print of a plan, for each page

5.00


6.

(1)

For certifying a copy for which item 5 applies 

2.00


 

(2)

For an abstract under section 14 of the Registry Act,

 


 

 

(i) basic fee 

50.00


 

 

(ii) for each instrument included in the abstract 

1.00


7.

 

For the correction of errors, defects and omissions in a registered or deposited plan 

50.00 R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 994, Sched.; O. Reg. 325/91, s. 1; O. Reg. 280/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 327/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 516/93, s. 1.

1. The fees set out in the Schedule are payable under the Act. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 994, s. 1.

SCHEDULE
TARIFF OF FEES

Item

Column 1

Column 2

 

Service

Fee

1.

  

Except as set out in items 2 and 3, for registration or deposit of an instrument or plan, including recording

$50.00

2.

  

For registration of,

  
   

    (a) a certificate under subsection 3 (3) of the Housing Development Act;

  
   

    (b) a notice of credit or refund or a certificate of discharge under subsection 2 (5) of The Municipal and School Tax Credit Assistance Act, being chapter 285 of the Revised Statutes of Ontario, 1970;

  
   

    (c) a lien clearance certificate or affidavit of exemption under The Land Speculation Tax Act, 1974, being chapter 17;

  
   

    (d) a copy of the plan and field notes of a municipal or crown resurvey under Part VIII of the Surveys Act;

  
   

    (e) a notice of a change of address for service; or

  
   

    (f) a plan under the Boundaries Act

No fee

   

    (g) Revoked: O. Reg. 516/93, s. 1 (2).

  
   

    (h) Revoked: O. Reg. 516/93, s. 1 (2).

  

3.

  

For registration of,

  
   

    (a) a declaration and description under the Condominium Act,

  
   

    (i) basic fee

50.00

   

    (ii) for each unit created by the description

5.00

   

    (b) a plan of subdivision,

  
   

    (i) basic fee

50.00

   

    (ii) for each lot or block created by the plan

2.00

4.

  

For a search of,

  
   

    (a) a fee, receiving or day book

No fee

   

    (b) any other index or register for a parcel

5.00

   

    (c) an instrument, deposit or plan

No fee

5.

(1)

For a copy of,

  
   

    (a) an instrument or plan, for each page

.50

   

    (b) the index or register for a parcel,

  
   

    (i) for the first page

5.00

   

    (ii) for each subsequent page

1.00

 

(2)

For a paper print of a plan, for each page

5.00

6.

(1)

For certifying a copy for which item 5 applies

2.00

 

(2)

For an abstract under section 14 of the Registry Act,

  
   

    (i) basic fee

50.00

   

    (ii) for each instrument included in the abstract

1.00

7.

  

For the correction of errors, defects and omissions in a registered or deposited plan

50.00

R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 994, Sched.; O. Reg. 325/91, s. 1; O. Reg. 280/92, s. 1; O. Reg. 327/93, s. 1; O. Reg. 516/93, s. 1.
